snippet: Young people have voted more Democratic since the 2004 election of George W. Bush, and they are much more likely than other groups to support a larger role for government.
lead_paragraph: Young people have voted more Democratic since the 2004 election of George W. Bush, and they are much more likely than other groups to support a larger role for government.

headline.seo: Youth In the Age of Obama
headline.main: Youth In the Age of Obama
